title: Adhiparasakthi Engineering College Admission 2024: Courses, Fees, Application Process, Eligibility
meta_description: Adhiparasakthi Engineering College - [APEC], Kanchipuram, Tamil Nadu. Admission News for

Expired Events.Events: Online Registration & Filling of Applications (TANCET Counselling) [MBA]

APEC Fees & Eligibility.COURSE: BE/B.Tech, M.Phil/Ph.D in Engineering, M.Phil/Ph.D in Science, MBA/PGDM, MCA, ME/M.Tech,

faqs.question: Ques.Does the institute offer campus placements? Who were the top recruiters?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the institute does offer campus placements, Many top tier companies like amazon, IBM, oracle, TCS recruited students from the college.

faqs.question: Does the college provide scholarships?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, scholarships are provided by the government and third party organisations to encourage students to maintain their spirit towards academics.

faqs.question: Does the college organise any events?
faqs.answer: Ans.Frequently the college organises events for students and faculties to develop their skills and bring out the hidden talents.

faqs.question: What is the registration fee for TNEA?
faqs.answer: Ans.The registration fee for TNEA counseling is INR. 500/- (INR. 250/- for SC/ST/PH and INR. 100/- for special reservation category) which can be paid by Credit/ Debit Card/ Net-Banking or through DD drawn in favour of ‘The Secretary, TNEA Admissions, Anna University payable at Chennai’.
